text: Tum ehle iman ki adawat (dushmani) mein sabse zyada sakht yahud aur mushrikeen ko paogey, aur iman laney walon ke liye dosti mein qareeb-tar un logon ko paogey jinhon ne kaha tha ke hum nasara (Christians) hain, is wajah se ke unmein ibadat-guzaar aalim aur tareek ud duniya fakeer (monks) paye jatey hain aur unmein guroor e nafs (arrogant) nahin hai
